title: Juxta, Magi
description: Juxta is a 12-year-old street urchin who begs for copper pieces.Lynken is a rich kingdom, and the king is pissed, because no street urchins should live in his capital.Enter Hebron, an ancient master willing to take on an apprentice.Push comes to shove, Juxta is good at magic, but he also has dire problems with rage. He must control the fury in his heart, or his darkest fear will be realized, using magic on his friends.And you know, war. It seems Lynken is almost always at war.High adventure with epic fantasy scale.
author: Geoffrey Porter
